title: uglysmurf
author: uglysmurf
created_time: March 14, 2023, 02:13:20 PMLast edit: March 23, 2023, 09:00:18 PM by uglysmurf
content: Hello,I want to sell my Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 256 GB Black (new in box, sealed). I got the phone from work but use iphone myself.Comes with 2 year warranty and no sim lock.Asking price: $800 or 0.031 BTCLocated in Greece and prefer to deal F2F, payment can be done cash, BTC or bank transfer.If interested please send me PM

comments.author: Crydeal
comments.body: Would you be willing to make the payment through crydeal.com? where we both stake tokens in the smart contract to complete the transaction?

comments.author: uglysmurf
comments.body: Quote from: Crydeal on March 15, 2023, 03:13:39 AMWould you be willing to make the payment through crydeal.com? where we both stake tokens in the smart contract to complete the transaction?No, sorry.

comments.author: Crydeal
comments.body: Would you mind explaining the reasoning behind your decision?

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Quote from: Crydeal on March 15, 2023, 09:49:20 AMWould you mind explaining the reasoning behind your decision?Dude why do you keep pushing the crydeal.com on lot of thread your platform is new go make some announcement or something similar and gain trust if your site is really legit

comments.author: Crydeal
comments.body: Quote from: dansus021 on March 17, 2023, 02:29:27 AMQuote from: Crydeal on March 15, 2023, 09:49:20 AMWould you mind explaining the reasoning behind your decision?Dude why do you keep pushing the crydeal.com on lot of thread your platform is new go make some announcement or something similar and gain trust if your site is really legitThank you for your suggestion. I don't have previous experience with promotion, and I thought this approach would help people become aware of my website. I previously posted in the Service Announcement section, but it didn't get much attention.
